thread.title: Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt have a Shaandaar Navratri with garba queen Falguni Pathak (In Pics)
thread.title_full: Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt have a Shaandaar Navratri with garba queen Falguni Pathak (In Pics)

author: Maggie Davis
title: Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt have a Shaandaar Navratri with garba queen Falguni Pathak (In Pics)
text:
Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt have a Shaandaar Navratri with garba queen Falguni Pathak (In Pics) By Maggie Davis on October 21, 2015 at 5:25 PM Comments Just one more day to go for Dussehra and ‘Shaandaar’ ! Before the big day, the lead pair of ‘Shaandaar’ , Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt was seen having a blast with the garba queen Falguni Pathak. The lead pair of Vikas Bahl directorial flick was at Ahemdabad last night (October 20). The duo celebrated Navratri with the singer and the crowd in a ‘Shaandaar’ way. Shahid and Alia did not miss to do some garba steps with Falguni Pathak. It must have been a gala night for all Shaalia fans. Alia even posted some videos on the photo sharing site Instagram. Donning the perfect Navratri attire, Shahid and Alia looked the perfect pair for the daandiya night. Here are the pictures and videos of the amazing garba night. (ALSO READ: Shaandaar song Eena Meena Deeka teaser: Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt groove to the most loved song of the 60s) The stunning lead actress of the upcoming flick Alia sported a white dhoti that had minimal embroidery work. It was chic attire that she chose to don for the daandiya night. She looked class apart as she did not opt for the regular ghagra choli but went for a modernised desi outfit. The pair of chandelier earring, tiny sparkling bindi, minimal makeup and stylish braids made her the diva of the night. On the other hand, handsome hunk Shahid donned a simple short kurta with white pants. (ALSO READ: Shahid Kapoor, Mira Rajput & Alia Bhatt form a Shaandaar trio!) A photo posted by Alia (@aliaabhatt) on Oct 20, 2015 at 8:39am PDT 
A video posted by Alia (@aliaabhatt) on Oct 20, 2015 at 11:52am PDT 
A video posted by Alia (@aliaabhatt) on Oct 20, 2015 at 10:42am PDT 
We must say that the cast is not leaving any chance to promote the film. Every nook and corner they are reaching to promote the film. What a promotional spree! ‘Shaandaar’ will hit the silver screens tomorrow, October 22. Being the day of Dussehra, it is expected that the theaters are going to be housefull. The much awaited blingy wedding affair film has created lot of curiosity amongst the fans. Above all, we just cannot wait to watch the fresh on-screen pair – Shahid and Alia together. (ALSO READ: Alia Bhatt and her different moods: Look how the Shaandaar girl reacts to our questions!) 
  5:49 PM Topics:
